soft_skills.phrase: Je bent sterk in het samenwerken met teams
Het oplossen van problemen met defecte apparatuur met weinig tot geen hulp.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement describes responsibilities focused on physical data center hardware operations, server and network maintenance, and Linux system administration. None of these tasks align with the definitions provided in the CODING_BOOK.md for Core Software Engineering (Macro-Category A) or GenAI Specialization (Macro-Category B), which are specifically focused on AI/ML concepts, models, and infrastructure. The role does not involve any AI/ML development, integration, or specialization.

confidence.reasoning: The job description clearly and unambiguously outlines tasks related to hardware and data center operations, with no mention of AI or ML. This makes the classification as 'Not Relevant' straightforward and highly confident, despite the potentially misleading job title.
